settings.title: Settings
settings.ip_caption: The IP required for verification is the one that has the highest number of shares submitted during the past 24 hours.
settings.ip_hint: Hint: You are visiting this webpage from
settings.ip_description: If your worker is using proxy address, e.g. your worker is dual mining through a ZIL pool, please use the proxy address instead.
settings.high_fees_warning: A payout limit under 0.05 ETH will result in high gas fees that will be deducted from your payment. Please set up a higher payout limit if possible.

payout.title: Payout Settings
payout.eth_mainnet: You payout will be sent via Ethereum Mainnet. This is the main Ethereum network, it is more decentralized and secure, but has a significant transaction fee.
payout.eth_polygon: You payout will be sent via Polygon (L2). L2 offers significant lower transaction fees and your payment will be processed in WETH (Wrapped ETH). Please make sure you understand how this is going to affect your payouts before switching networks.
payout.limit_desc: You will be paid only after your unpaid balance will reach {{value}}. Your entire unpaid balance will be paid out, not just your threshold amount.
payout.gas_limit_desc: Your transaction fee gas price would be limited to {{value}} {{valueUnit}} ({{valueTicker}}, {delimiter} of payout limit). You will not receive any payouts if gas price is higher.
payout.gas_limit_zero: Your transaction fee will not be limited.
payout.l2_warning: Please make sure your wallet support <bold>{{network_name}}</bold> WETH deposits. Otherwise, your funds will be lost forever.
payout.l2_acknowledge: I acknowledge that my wallet supports <bold>{{network_name}}</bold> L2 network, that the funds will be irreversibly lost otherwise, and that I know how to deal with payouts made in the <bold>{{network_name}}</bold> network.

difficulty.title: Difficulty Settings
difficulty.warning: The adjustable difficulty is a feature for advanced users only. We strongly recommend keeping 1 unless you have specific requirements. Please do not change the difficulty unless you know what you are doing. For compressed plots, it is suggested to change difficulty to 18 or higher.
difficulty.acknowledge: I acknowledge that higher difficulty will make the effective space calculations less precise.
difficulty.pending_difficulty: You have a pending difficulty change of {{difficulty}}. Please wait up to 10 minutes for the changes to be applied.
difficulty.launcher_id_desc: Use the Launcher ID to check the difficulty of your current PlotNFT.
difficulty.launcher_id_error: The launcher ID is invalid, please try again.
difficulty.difficulty_desc: Difficulty determines the frequency of partials. The lower the difficulty is, the more partials you will get. More partials will result in more precise stats.
difficulty.login_link_desc: A Login Link is required to prove you own this PlotNFT.

payout_warning: We highly recommend setting a higher payout limit to reduce total number of payout transactions. Less transactions means less network fees.

You are the only one responsible for paying the transaction fees. We are strongly in favour of setting a transaction fee limit lower to avoid a total loss of money due to high network fees. This will also help you partially mitigate losses when sudden fee spikes happen.

notifications.title: Email notifications
notifications.check_worker_down: Warn me when one of my workers goes down
notifications.check_payout_sent: Notify me when a payout has been sent
notifications.offline_duration: We will notify you if we haven't received any shares from your rig in {{duration}}.

header.greet_desc: {{count}} worker is mining {{coin}} and is hashing {{hashrate}} in total.
header.greet_desc_plural: {{count}} workers are mining {{coin}} and are hashing {{hashrate}} in total.
header.greet_desc_farm: {{count}} worker is farming {{coin}} with {{hashrate}} of storage.
header.greet_desc_farm_plural: {{count}} workers are farming {{coin}} with {{hashrate}} of total storage.
header.info_joined_tooltip: Your first share has been recorded on
header.info_joined_tooltip_empty: No share has been recorded yet
header.stat_unpaid_balance_reach_ok: Your payout will be processed on the next hourly payment round if the fee preferences are met.
header.stat_unpaid_balance_reach_ok_l2: Your payout will be processed on the next L2 payment round, which happens randomly every 24 hours.
header.stat_unpaid_balance_reach_delayed_by_gas: However, your payout won't be processed because your gas price limit of <v>{{gasLimit}}</v> is lower than the current network gas price of <v>{{currentGas}}</v>.
header.stat_estimate_tooltip: Click to change between daily, weekly and monthly estimates.
header.time_to_lambo: Your estimated time to Lambo is {{time}}.

avp.title: Average Paying Hashrate
avp.tooltip: Calculated based on current round share and the last 3 hours of the pool hashrate chart.

log.title: Share Log Wipeout Duration
log.tooltip: Time for the round share to drop to zero.

transaction_fees.title: Transaction Fees
average_cta_tooltip: 1. Setting higher payout limit will reduce the number of transactions you will have to pay for in terms of network transaction fees.

2. Set your transaction fee limit to avoid high fees in the settings. When you reach your payout threshold, we will make sure that your payout transaction will be executed as soon as it meets your fee limit settings.

table_head.value_tooltip: The fiat conversion is based on the price at the time of the payout.

stats.not_enough_data_message: We don't have enough data to show charts. If your workers are already mining, please allow up to 10 minutes for the data to be processed.

proTips.chartsProTip: Click on legend items to include/exclude related values on the chart
proTips.tablesProTip: You can sort your worker table by clicking on the headers.
proTips.hoverHashrateProtip: You can hover on "Average Effective (E.)" hashrate and see the last 6h and 12h average hashrate.
proTips.apiProTip: The full-fledged Flexpool API is publicly available.
proTips.searchProTip: If you just click the search button on the homepage, you will be directed to your latest viewed address.
proTips.payoutExportProTip: You can export all your transactions as a CSV sheet in the "Payouts" tab.
proTips.rewardsExportProTip: You can export all your rewards as a CSV sheet in the "Rewards" tab.

announcements.the_merge:
The Merge has been completed as of September 16, 2022, at 06:41 UTC. Ethereum mining is longer possible.
Payouts will still happen if you have met your minimum or applied for an exception. Unpaid balances will be maintained until at least December 15, 2022. Please read our our official announcement for details.

gigahorse.compressed_plots_support: Gigahorse compressed plots are now available in FlexFarmer.

gminer_flaw.detail: GMiner versions 3.28 and earlier have a flaw that prevents automatic reconnection to the pool following server restarts, which are standard procedures during software or server upgrades. If you see your ZIL hashrate on GMiner suddenly disappear, you'll need to restart it manually every time this happens until GMiner developers fix this. You can also switch to other miners, or use Compatible Mode by following our guide.

e9_issue.detail:
On February 26th 2023, we announced that we implemented support for E9 Pro ASICs to mine ZIL. Unfortunately, it turned out that E9 Pro was never supported, and it was producing invalid shares only that did not contribute to pool rewards. Normally, invalid shares are rejected, but there turned out to be a software bug that allowed invalid shares to slip through under certain circumstances.

Rewards for E9 Pro's dead weight were distributed and paid according to the PPLNS reward scheme, and given that E9 Pro ASICs did not contribute to the pool, regular miners ended up substituting them by receiving 5-10% fewer rewards on average. To compensate for this, we charge no combined pool + operations fee for our Zilliqa (ZIL) pool for the entire month from March 18th 2023 until April 18th 2023, which is roughly equivalent to 19%.

Read the full statement here for more information.

zil_upgrade.detail:
On April 25th, the ZIL network will be undergoing a major upgrade.
This will make mining unavailable for roughly a day.

Read the official statement from Zilliqa.

zil_delist.detail:
We will shut down our Zilliqa (ZIL) pool in two weeks, which is set to happen on May 19th, 2023.
This decision is made due to the recent unstable network and critical issues resulting from the hard fork aimed to upgrade Zilliqa.

Read more here

payout_only_mode_note.title: The pool is in payout-only mode
payout_only_mode_note.p1: You can no longer mine Ethereum. Please use your last IP address used to update your payout preferences or change the payout network to execute a payment. If you do not know this IP address or it does not work, contact <supportlink>support</supportlink> with your ETH address (and an increased gas price limit if your limit is below 10). We will take care of your change for you within 72 hours.
payout_only_mode_note.p2: Don't hesitate to get in touch with <supportlink>support</supportlink> if you have a custom request like a balance transfer from one address to another. (A signed Ethereum digital message is required, and it's not supported by exchanges.)

warning_header: It looks like your dashboard is not ready yet.
warning_description: If you are new here, your dashboard will be ready within 20 minutes of your first submitted share to this address. Please check back a little later.
pending_description: Your address is recognized by the pool, please wait 10 minutes for the stats to be ready.

zil_promotion_popup.learn_more_about: Learn more about dual mining Zilliqa
zil_promotion_popup.get_the_most: Get the most out of your mining rigs
zil_promotion_popup.read_our_guide: Read our in-depth guide for GPU miners or ASICs to get started
